answers.answer: what ya mean? have you not been seen at all the whole preg?
i have been to every check up and had all the scans but i needed to go and have my 28 week check up (glucose test) to check for diabetes but can't get into hospital, have to wait another 2 weeks
oh, ok, well as long as your not having no prob, it should be fine

question: i was 28 weeks pregnant last week but the hospital couldn't fit me in to have the check up for another 3 weeks, which means i will be 31 weeks. is it still okay or is it to late.
title: coley77
